articles.title: Watch: Saudi Arabia coach Herve Renard’s inspiring half time talk in match against Argentina
articles.description: After Saudi Arabia went to the dressing room at interval, Renard shared his pearls of wisdom with his team, saying, "Messi, he has the ball in the middle of the pitch and you stand [hands up] in front of the defence. You have to go and mark him in the middle. Take your phone, you can make a picture with him!"
articles.content: Saudi Arabia’s 1-2 win against Argentina on Sunday was one of the most biggest upsets in World Cup history. But the fairytale win had a stuttering start as the Asian nation went into half time 1-0 down after Argentine superstar Lionel Messi had conve... [1312 chars]

articles.title: Soccer-Argentina win has not changed us says Saudi Arabia coach
articles.description: By Karolos Grohmann AL RAYYAN, Nov 25 (Reuters) - Saudi Arabia's stunning 2-1 comeback win over Argentina in their World Cup Group C opener this week sent shockwaves across the football world but for coach Herve Renard it was just one of three difficult group games, with Poland up next on Saturday.
